user_info.bio: Living one day at a time

messages.text: Hello dear, I saw your profile picture and I was captivated by your smile. You have the eyes of an angel.
Oh, hello. That's very kind of you.
Kindness is what I see in you. My name is David, an engineer from the UK. What does a beautiful woman like you do?
I'm a teacher. It's nice to meet you, David.
A teacher! That is so noble. You must have such a good heart. Are you single? I'm sorry if I am too forward, but I feel a strong connection, like destiny.
Yes, I am.
I knew it. A jewel like you should not be alone. I have been so lonely since my wife passed away. It is hard to find someone with a pure soul to trust.
I'm sorry for your loss.
Thank you, dear. Talking to you makes the pain go away. I feel I can tell you my secrets. You are special.
Good evening my queen. I hope you had a good day. I was thinking of you all day.
Good evening. It was a normal day.
Oh no, my dear, something terrible has happened. I am so distressed.
What's wrong?
My phone, it fell and the screen is broken. And my wallet was stolen today. I cannot access my bank account from this temporary device. I feel so desperate.
That's awful! Are you okay?
I am, but I need to buy a new phone immediately for my work. I have a big presentation. I don't know who to turn to. You are the only one I trust.
I don't know how I can help...
There is a way. Can you please help me with a Google Play gift card? It is an emergency. You can buy it online. Just ₹10,000. I can use it to buy a phone from the online store here.
I will pay you back double as soon as I can access my account tomorrow, I promise my queen. Please, you are my only hope.
I'm not sure... that's a lot of money.
Please, I am desperate. I thought we had a special trust. Don't you trust me?
My dear? Are you there? Please, the shops will close soon. I need your help now.
I am so worried. Please don't abandon me in my time of need.
Okay, okay... how do I buy one?
Thank you my angel! You are saving me! Just go to Amazon and search for it. Once you buy it, just scratch the back and send me a photo of the code. Quick, my love.
